item.title: Seriously WTForm
item.description:
I'm about neck deep into a large Flask application. It's an MVP so no over the top Angular frontend or anything. Means I'm using a lot of WTForm to get user input...

Means I'm saying "WTF?!" a lot!
I've used WTForms before. In django projects as well. I've never really …
item.dc:creator: Wayne du Preez

item.title: Quattro
item.description:
This should probably have something else...

Let's test some syntax highlighting:

@hosts(production)
def publish():
    local('pelican -s publishconf.py')
    )

Why didn't the damn icon show up.
